thread.title: Sunita Merry
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Sunita Merry

author: Sunita Merry
title: Sunita Merry
text: Bought the BBG guides from this website. It is legit!!! I received an email confirmation and another email containing the links to the workouts within minutes! Got a great deal and got everything that was promised! 80% off, very happy with my purchase. Can't wait to begin! The program looks great with a lot of detail. Check it out if you are looking for a new workout plan :)
